artist: Artist: Toyohara Chikanobu; Publisher: Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: triptych, three sheets attached and folded in album: ornately decorated shrine with procession of ornately dressed male figures in red and black emerging from gate; other male spectators kneeling
markings: Seal (red) LLQ of R sheet: Yo_ | Seals (black) LLQ of R sheet: Printed and published by Fukuda Hatsujiro_ in August of Meiji 30 / Carver: Horiei the second
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Signed LLQ of R sheet: Yo_shu_ Kunichika | Title URQ
title: The Scene of the First Visit to Zo_jo_ji Temple of the Year
